entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
